statement.p: Determine if the following scenario is a binomial experiment. If it is not binomial, then select all of the reasons why.

p.em: Brand A has a history of recalling 27 of their products. An employee at Walmart is going through a list of 54 recalls, and records the number of products being recalled by Brand A.

ol.li: There is not a fixed number of trials.
There are more than two outcomes.
The probability of success is not the same for each trial.
All of the conditions for being a binomial experiement are met, i.e., this is a binomial experiment.

li.p: All of the conditions for being a binomial experiement are met, i.e., this is a binomial experiment.
